body:
Please file this bug report at https://github.com/flutter/flutter-intellij/issues/new.

---

## What happened

working with cached video player plugin

## Version information

Android Studio `Arctic Fox | 2020.3.1 Patch 4` • Flutter plugin `io.flutter 63.2.1` • Dart plugin `203.8452`

Flutter 2.8.0 • channel stable • https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git
Framework • revision cf44000065 (7 weeks ago) • 2021-12-08 14:06:50 -0800
Engine • revision 40a99c5951
Tools • Dart 2.15.0

## Exception

null

```
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Wrong end: 6808; document length=5845; start=6791
```

title: Plugin crash bug report
